author: Drumaqueen_MW
title: Great location near St Pancras station - but so quiet!
text: Staff were exceptionally friendly - Premier Inn staff always appear to be happy to work there, despite often doing 5 things at once! the room was comfy and quiet despite it's busy location - my fitbit said it was the best night's sleep I have had in weeks!
